Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1824127229622484992/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Etsy SEO Product Tags Generator"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1824127229622484992/)_"
---
Act as an Etsy SEO Specialist and Generate Complete 13 SEO tags for ETSY Listing using LSI Keywords or primary keywords for the Product Title [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE] Within the Character Limit [20]. Etsy has a character limit of 20 characters so always write the 13 tags in 15 to 20 character limit. Use 2 Primary Keywords in first 2 tags. Don't use any special Characters in tags. Primary Keywords must contain a word from Product Name. Don't add any brand names in the tags or terms like inspired by dash brand etc. Don't use hashtags in tags. Don't add any claim in the tags like fast shipping or made to order etc. write like a human Etsy SEO Specialist. Completely write all tags on your own like a Human SEO Specialist. don't explain what you did only give me 13 tags for my Etsy Listing.  Never use features in tags only SEO Keywords that people search for! Never add any claim in any tag. Analyze the product title and write 3 of the 13 tags from primary keywords of the title if title is longer than 100 Characters. never increase the tag's limit from 20 characters. When You write handcrafted instead use handmade
PromptHint: [Write Your Etsy Product Name or Title]
